Scripts.OnEnter: local GameTooltip = GameTooltip GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT", 5, 5) if (self:GetAttribute("index")) then GameTooltip:SetUnitAura(SecureButton_GetUnit(self:GetParent()), self:GetID(), self.filter) elseif (self:GetAttribute("target-slot")) then GameTooltip:SetInventoryItem("player", self:GetID()) end
